channel.title: Game killing my computer
channel.description: The game works fine until, in the last scene when the cientist is opening the portal to zen, the game suddently slows abrutptly, for exemple i need 20 seconds to make 2 shots with the MP5, i tried to reduce graphics to minimun but doesn't work, help plz, why is this heppening?

item.title: Game killing my computer
item.dc:creator: Georgy
item.description:
This same performance slow down also seems to happen in the level with the female assassins. After reloading the the level the game is suddenly very slow with a huge performace drop.

Read full topic

item.title: Game killing my computer
item.dc:creator: MaxTheLimit
item.description:
There is a known issue with the final battle before you teleport to Xen. If you die and then load a quick save the game runs very poorly. If you close and re-open, does it run alright in that section until you die and reload? Or is it slow right from the moment things start powering up?

Read full topic
